It has come to my attention that I have not been fair to KSLawdogg revently=
. Actually, he hasn't been fair to me. If you go to the rules page you will=
 see this:

"The limit number of shots per post is: 20-25 rapid fire shots =
per 
rapid-fire weapon, 8 semi-automatic shots, 4 normal shots per gun, and=
 2 
missiles per post (for each character). This does not mean you can fire=
 25 
shots from a machine gun, put that down, fire 4 shots from a normal gu=
n, put 
that down, etc... This rule is in place to prevent bots letting loo=
se a 
deadly assault in one post, and make RPGing alot more enjoyable."

No=
w then, that is from the rules page, so shouldn't it be obeyed? I promise I=
 will not break this rule any longer, but I would like an apology from Lord=
 Unitron. Or is he too big and full of himself to apologize after seeing th=
is? If I never get an apology, it's okay, but I will spread the word about =
this indeed. Sorry Zardus, but I had to post this, to show everyone that it=
 is indeed a rule and that it was being broken by out main moderator. Thank=
 you for reading this...
